attributes.action: I would like mandatory letters to be sent out to men for their prostate checks
attributes.additional_details: If it wasn't for our scheme he wouldn't have been for the test so now it will cost the NHS a lot more money to treat him so surely it makes sense to catch it early and so cheaper to treat and what's the cost of a simple letter being sent out telling them they're test is due.
attributes.background: I run a pub and started a scheme that if men went for a prostate check they got a free pint because of this they started going. One of my customers has found out he has acute/advanced prostate where as if he had been tested 3 years ago he could have been treated then but he didn't know.

rejection.details:
We think that this petition is similar:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/211974
